metadata.title: CVE-2018-12584 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The ConnectionBase::preparseNewBytes function inresip/stack/ConnectionBase.cxx in reSIProcate through 1.10.2 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (buffer overflow) or possiblyexecute arbitrary code when TLS communication is enabled.

criterions.comment: resiprocate: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
